src:
Pri Ríme zaznamenali zemetrasenie s magnitúdou 4,4
Nehlásia materiálne škody ani zranenia.
07 Nov 2019, 20:19 by RÍM/TASR
Zemetrasenie s magnitúdou 4,4 zaznamenali vo štvrtok v kopcovitej oblasti zhruba 100 kilometrov juhovýchodne od talianskej metropoly Rím, v ktorej obyvatelia taktiež pocítili otrasy. Informovala o tom agentúra DPA s tým, že z oblasti bezprostredne nehlásili materiálne škody či zranenia.
K zemetraseniu došlo o 18.35 h SEČ. Hypocentrum otrasov sa nachádzalo v hĺbke 14 kilometrov pri meste Balsorano, informoval taliansky Inštitút pre geológiu a vulkanológiu (INGV).
Balsorano leží zhruba 130 kilometrov juhovýchodne od Ríma. Štvrtkové otrasy boli citeľné v niektorých častiach Ríma, ako aj iných talianskych mestách vrátane Neapola.
Taliansko je na zemetrasenia pomerne náchylné. V auguste 2016 prišlo pri silnom zemetrasení s magnitúdou 6,2 v meste Amatrice ležiacom v strednej časti krajiny o život takmer 300 osôb.
text:
At Rome, they reported an earthquake with magnitude 4.4
It does not report material damage or injury.
07 Nov 2019, 20:19 by ROME / TASR
An earthquake with a magnitude of 4.4 recorded on Thursday in a hilly area about 100 kilometers southeast of the Italian capital Rome, in which residents also experienced shocks. She informed the DPA that they were not immediately reporting material damage or injury from the area.
The earthquake occurred at 18.35 CET. The shake hypocenter was 14 kilometers deep near Balsorano, the Italian Institute of Geology and Volcanology (INGV) reported.
Balsorano lies about 130 kilometers southeast of Rome. Thursday's shocks were felt in some parts of Rome, as well as in other Italian cities, including Naples.
Italy is relatively vulnerable to earthquakes. In August 2016, nearly 300 people lost their lives in a major earthquake with magnitude 6.2 in Amatrice, located in the central part of the country.
